46654.name: Arcane Keysmith
46654.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
46654.flavorText: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

47692.name: Archmage Arugal
47692.text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to your hand.
47692.flavorText: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

46874.name: Azalina Soulthief
46874.text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's.
46874.flavorText: The cards are always golden on the other side.

48158.name: Baku the Mooneater
48158.text: Start of Game: If your deck has only odd- Cost cards, upgrade your Hero Power.
48158.flavorText: In her defense, it did look like a cookie.

48039.name: Baleful Banker
48039.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.

47405.name: Bellringer Sentry
47405.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
47405.flavorText: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

46903.name: Bewitched Guardian
46903.text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.

48445.name: Black Cat
48445.text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
48445.flavorText: She's so odd, you can't even.

46721.name: Blackhowl Gunspire
46721.text: Can't attack. Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
46721.flavorText: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

48393.name: Blazing Invocation
48393.flavorText: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

48199.name: Blink Fox
48199.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
48199.flavorText: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

47694.name: Blood Witch
47694.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.
47694.flavorText: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

47873.name: Bogshaper
47873.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your deck.
47873.flavorText: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

47438.name: Bonfire Elemental
47438.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, draw a card.

47054.name: Book of Specters
47054.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
47054.flavorText: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

48902.name: Carrion Drake
48902.text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
48902.flavorText: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

47416.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
47416.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
47416.flavorText: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

46658.name: Cauldron Elemental
46658.flavorText: Decorating tip: Unused cauldrons can make a lovely elemental display.

46706.name: Chameleos
46706.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
46706.flavorText: He's everyone you want to be.

47458.name: Chief Inspector
47458.flavorText: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

46715.name: Cinderstorm
46715.text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
46715.flavorText: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

47439.name: Clockwork Automaton
47439.text: Double the damage and healing of your Hero Power.
47439.flavorText: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

47836.name: Coffin Crasher
47836.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.

47131.name: Countess Ashmore
47131.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush, Lifesteal, and Deathrattle card from your deck.
47131.flavorText: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

47429.name: Curio Collector
47429.text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
47429.flavorText: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

47555.name: Curse of Weakness
47555.text: Echo Give all enemy minions -2 Attack until your next turn.
47555.flavorText: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

47071.name: Cursed Castaway
47071.text: Rush Deathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
47071.flavorText: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

48585.name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
48585.flavorText: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

47053.name: Darius Crowley
47053.text: Rush After this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
47053.flavorText: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

47033.name: Dark Possession
47033.text: Deal 2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
47033.flavorText: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

46660.name: Darkmire Moonkin
46660.flavorText: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

47016.name: Deadly Arsenal
47016.text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.

47085.name: Deathweb Spider
47085.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
47085.flavorText: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

46656.name: Deranged Doctor
46656.flavorText: Unfortunately, his doctorate is in Murloc Literature.

48201.name: Dire Frenzy
48201.text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
48201.flavorText: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

47549.name: Divine Hymn
47549.text: Restore 6 Health to all friendly characters.
47549.flavorText: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

47298.name: Dollmaster Dorian
47298.text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
47298.flavorText: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

46859.name: Druid of the Scythe
46859.text: Choose One - Transform into a 4/2 with Rush; or a 2/4 with Taunt.
46859.flavorText: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

46904.name: Duskbat
46904.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
46904.flavorText: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

47819.name: Duskfallen Aviana
47819.text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
47819.flavorText: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

46596.name: Duskhaven Hunter
46596.text: Stealth Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
46596.flavorText: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

47152.name: Earthen Might
47152.text: Give a minion +2/+2. If it's an Elemental, add a random Elemental to your hand.

46678.name: Emeriss
46678.text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in your hand.
46678.flavorText: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.

47599.name: Face Collector
47599.text: Echo Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
47599.flavorText: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

47423.name: Ferocious Howl
47423.text: Draw a card. Gain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
47423.flavorText: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

47516.name: Festeroot Hulk
47516.text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.

46864.name: Fiendish Circle
46864.flavorText: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

48286.name: Forest Guide
48286.text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
48286.flavorText: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

46659.name: Furious Ettin
46659.flavorText: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

47693.name: Genn Greymane
47693.text: Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
47693.flavorText: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

47051.name: Ghostly Charger
47051.flavorText: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

46601.name: Gilnean Royal Guard
46601.text: Divine Shield, Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
46601.flavorText: Admittedly, they kind of dropped the ball with Prince Liam.

47295.name: Glinda Crowskin
47295.flavorText: Summon an unlimited* number of minions!** *Six **Wisps

48444.name: Glitter Moth
48444.text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
48444.flavorText: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

46680.name: Gloom Stag
46680.text: Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
46680.flavorText: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

46887.name: Hagatha the Witch
46887.flavorText: Curse-bringer, tree-twister, mother of wretched things…Hanzo main.

47014.name: Hench-Clan Thug
47014.text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
47014.flavorText: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

48832.name: Hidden Wisdom
48832.text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
48832.flavorText: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

46694.name: Holy Water
46694.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your hand.
46694.flavorText: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

47930.name: Hunting Mastiff
47930.flavorText: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

48560.name: Lady in White
48560.text: Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire' on every minion in your deck (set Attack equal to Health).
48560.flavorText: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

47343.name: Lifedrinker
47343.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
47343.flavorText: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

48156.name: Lord Godfrey
48156.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this Battlecry.
48156.flavorText: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

46950.name: Lost Spirit
46950.flavorText: She simply refuses to ask for directions.

46674.name: Mad Hatter
46674.text: Battlecry: Randomly toss 3 hats to other minions. Each hat gives +1/+1.
46674.flavorText: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

47607.name: Marsh Drake
47607.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
47607.flavorText: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

47825.name: Militia Commander
47825.flavorText: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

46908.name: Mistwraith
46908.text: Whenever you play an Echo card, gain +1/+1.
46908.flavorText: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

46667.name: Mossy Horror
46667.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions with 2 or less Attack.
46667.flavorText: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

47606.name: Muck Hunter
47606.text: Rush Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Mucklings for your opponent.

46996.name: Murkspark Eel
46996.text: Battlecry: If your deck has only even-Cost cards, deal 2 damage.

47348.name: Night Prowler
47348.text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
47348.flavorText: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

49502.name: Nightmare Amalgam
49502.flavorText: Be all that you can be.

46862.name: Nightscale Matriarch
46862.text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3 Whelp.

47614.name: Paragon of Light
47614.text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
47614.flavorText: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

46634.name: Phantom Militia
46634.flavorText: Recruited from the Gilnean opera house.

47799.name: Pick Pocket
47799.text: Echo Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
47799.flavorText: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

47696.name: Prince Liam
47696.text: Battlecry: Transform all 1-Cost cards in your deck into Legendary minions.
47696.flavorText: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

46598.name: Pumpkin Peasant
46598.text: Lifesteal Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.

46737.name: Quartz Elemental
46737.flavorText: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

46650.name: Rabid Worgen
46650.flavorText: "I'm sorry, son. We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

47128.name: Rat Trap
47128.text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
47128.flavorText: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

46936.name: Ratcatcher
46936.text: Rush Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
46936.flavorText: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

46661.name: Ravencaller
46661.text: Battlecry: Add two random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
46661.flavorText: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

46621.name: Rebuke
46621.text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
46621.flavorText: When one buke just isn’t enough.

46725.name: Redband Wasp
46725.flavorText: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

47134.name: Sandbinder
47134.text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.

47241.name: Scaleworm
47241.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
47241.flavorText: A popular local alternative to bananas.

48111.name: Shudderwock
48111.text: Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
48111.flavorText: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

47201.name: Silver Sword
47201.text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
47201.flavorText: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

47821.name: Snap Freeze
47821.text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
47821.flavorText: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

46713.name: Sound the Bells!
46713.flavorText: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

47594.name: Spectral Cutlass
47594.text: Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
47594.flavorText: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

46994.name: Spellshifter
46994.text: Spell Damage +1 Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.

47520.name: Splintergraft
47520.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 10/10 copy to your hand that costs (10).
47520.flavorText: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

47292.name: Splitting Festeroot
47292.flavorText: No use crying over split Festeroot,

48360.name: Squashling
48360.flavorText: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

48106.name: Swamp Dragon Egg
48106.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
48106.flavorText: Would you eat them in a ditch? Would you eat them with a witch?

47072.name: Swamp Leech
47072.flavorText: A face only a druid could love.

46992.name: Swift Messenger
46992.text: Rush Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.

46665.name: Tanglefur Mystic
46665.text: Battlecry: Add a random 2-Cost minion to each player's hand.
46665.flavorText: Doom! Only doom for you! But pay good tip, maybe less doom.

47211.name: Tess Greymane
47211.text: Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
47211.flavorText: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

48107.name: The Glass Knight
48107.text: Divine Shield Whenever you restore Health, gain Divine Shield.
48107.flavorText: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

47055.name: Toki, Time-Tinker
47055.text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion from the past to your hand.
47055.flavorText: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

47138.name: Totem Cruncher
47138.text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
47138.flavorText: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

47133.name: Town Crier
47133.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
47133.flavorText: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

47256.name: Toxmonger
47256.text: Whenever you play a 1-Cost minion, give it Poisonous.
47256.flavorText: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

47554.name: Vex Crow
47554.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random 2-Cost minion.
47554.flavorText: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

46710.name: Vicious Scalehide
46710.flavorText: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

47078.name: Vilebrood Skitterer
47078.flavorText: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

48002.name: Vivid Nightmare
48002.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it with 1 Health remaining.
48002.flavorText: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

47287.name: Voodoo Doll
47287.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Deathrattle: Destroy the chosen minion.
47287.flavorText: "Aww, I love it! It even kinda looks like me."

47625.name: WANTED!
47625.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.

47602.name: Walnut Sprite
47602.flavorText: How do you make a walnut laugh? Crack it up!

47515.name: Warpath
47515.flavorText: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

46940.name: Wing Blast
46940.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
46940.flavorText: Emeriss uses Wing Blast. It's super effective!

47063.name: Wispering Woods
47063.text: Summon a 1/1 Wisp for each card in your hand.
47063.flavorText: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

46998.name: Witch's Apprentice
46998.text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
46998.flavorText: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

48110.name: Witch's Cauldron
48110.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
48110.flavorText: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

47117.name: Witching Hour
47117.text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
47117.flavorText: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

47553.name: Witchwood Apple
47553.text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
47553.flavorText: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

47346.name: Witchwood Grizzly
47346.text: Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
47346.flavorText: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

47262.name: Witchwood Imp
47262.text: Stealth Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +2 Health.

47142.name: Witchwood Piper
47142.text: Battlecry: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck.
47142.flavorText: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

47511.name: Woodcutter's Axe
47511.text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly minion.
47511.flavorText: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

46655.name: Worgen Abomination
46655.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
46655.flavorText: Does anyone want to play dead!?

46988.name: Wyrmguard
46988.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
46988.flavorText: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

47222.name: Zap!
47222.flavorText: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.
